text: @NYGovCuomo THANK YOU @NYGovCuomo & @GovMurphy for your tireless efforts to help guide us through this crisis. Every day, you have been right there with us!  Your calm, clear, fact-based efforts give Americans what we need most now, hope! #coronavirus #COVID19 @ABC @CBSNews @MSNBC @fox5ny

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
